name: Boid Simulation
description:
mouse to look around

wasd / arrow key to smoothly navigate (scroll to "roughly" navigate)

E / left mouse click to open editor

P / esc to pause and exit

R to hide stats

C to zoom in

X to screenshot, the file will output to "Colorful Boid Simulation_Data\Screenshots" in the same directory as the executable

Best with lofi music :)

Shoutout to Sebastian League for the idea and inspiration and Forging Station for the performance boost implementation!

Cursor icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

Tip: sliding Chaos Meter to 0 for explosion and 2 for implosion.
